name: Adventure Map Algonquin P.P.3 Map - South
description: This Algonquin Park map covers the area from the Town of Whitney in the east to Kawagama Lake outside the park in the west, and from Canoe and Opeongo lakes in the north to Hay and Madawaska Lakes in the south. It also shows Dividing Lake Provincial Park, home of towering old growth white pines. Includes campsites, portages, access points, hiking trails, campgrounds, historic sites and local attractions.
